      • columns2line

        private static java.lang.String columns2line(java.util.List<ASCIIString> columns)
        This function reformats a row from the CSVfile into a String, and has major performance and stability issues. The StringBuilder is initialized to default length, which will always be too short for practical files --> memory fragmentation.
        Parameters:
        columns -
        Returns:
